description: This operation lists details about a partner event source that is shared with your account.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the partner event source to display the details of.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the partner event source.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The name of the SaaS partner that created the event source.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the event source was created.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the event source will expire if you do not create a matching event bus.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the partner event source.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the event source. If it is ACTIVE, you have already created a matching event bus for this event source, and that event bus is active. If it is PENDING, either you haven't yet created a matching event bus, or that event bus is deactivated. If it is DELETED, you have created a matching event bus, but the event source has since been deleted.
